structure.unit: ARTICLE X. LOCAL BUSINESS TAX RECEIPT IN UNINCORPORATED AREAS

law.catch_line: Doing business without local business tax receipt.

text.section:
Sec. 8A-224.1. Doing business without local business tax receipt.
Any person who shall carry on or conduct any business or profession for which a receipt is required, without first obtaining such license shall be guilty of a misdemeanor and upon conviction shall be punished by a fine of not more than double the amount required for such license or imprisonment not exceeding six (6) months.
